utils

Class BitUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.BitUtils

  • public final class BitUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class containing all bit twiddling hacks and the like
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int binLog(int bits)
      Fast (floor) log base 2 for integers Taken from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3305059/how-do-you-calculate-log-base-2-in-java-for-integers#3305710 Returns 0 for 0
      If the original number was a power of 2, 1<<(the returned result) should be original number
      static boolean isPo2(int bits)
      Fast power of 2 test Also returns true for 0, even though it isn't a power of 2

      Main method, used only for testing

    • Method Detail

      • writeBit

        public static int writeBit(int encoded,
                           int index,
                           boolean bit)
        Sets a bit in an int value
        Parameters:
        encoded - the original int value
        index - the position of the bit to change, from 0 to 31 inclusive, 0 would be the sign bit
        bit - the bit to write
        Returns:
        the modified int

      • readBit

        public static boolean readBit(int encoded,
                              int index)
        Reads a bit from an int value
        Parameters:
        encoded - the int value to read from
        index - the position of the bit to read, from 0 to 31 inclusive, 0 would be the sign bit
        Returns:
        true if the bit is 1, false if the bit is 0

      • writeBit

        public static long writeBit(long encoded,
                            int index,
                            boolean bit)
        Sets a bit in a long value
        Parameters:
        encoded - the original long value
        index - the position of the bit to change, from 0 to 63 inclusive, 0 would be the sign bit
        bit - the bit to write
        Returns:
        the modified long

      • readBit

        public static boolean readBit(long encoded,
                              int index)
        Reads a bit from an long value
        Parameters:
        encoded - the long value to read from
        index - the position of the bit to read, from 0 to 63 inclusive, 0 would be the sign bit
        Returns:
        true if the bit is 1, false if the bit is 0

        Returns:
        said int value

      • binLog

        public static int binLog(int bits)
        Fast (floor) log base 2 for integers Taken from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3305059/how-do-you-calculate-log-base-2-in-java-for-integers#3305710 Returns 0 for 0
        If the original number was a power of 2, 1<<(the returned result) should be original number
        Parameters:
        bits - the integer to calculate the log base 2 of
        Returns:
        the log base 2 of that integer

      • isPo2

        public static boolean isPo2(int bits)
        Fast power of 2 test Also returns true for 0, even though it isn't a power of 2
        Parameters:
        bits - the number to test
        Returns:
        true if the number is a power of 2

        Main method, used only for testing

        args - ignored
